attributes.action: Use the UK billion (1,000,000,000,000) one Million million, instead of the US billion (1,000,000,000) one thousand million
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are not the 51st state we spell colour not color. We spell Aeroplane not airplane. We visit the petrol station not the gas station. So why does the government confuse us with the US Billion and Trillion? When the treasury say billion what does it mean? We spell in the proper way that reflects our European heritage so why must we be subdued to the Americanizations (or is that the Americanisations) of our language?
Please Mr. Brown let's stay British if not European. SI units please
